price: 2 qui, pour eux-mêmes, exigent la pleine mesure,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
